thread.title: Emmaus' Kyle Boney is Week 7 EPC offensive MVP
thread.title_full: Emmaus' Kyle Boney is Week 7 EPC offensive MVP

title: Emmaus' Kyle Boney is Week 7 EPC offensive MVP
text:
Kyle Boney , Emmaus 
The senior running back has been putting up huge numbers in losses all year. On Friday night, he put up his biggest night while leading the Green Hornets to their biggest win of the year. 
Boney took 30 carries for 299 yards and four touchdowns as Emmaus upset Central Catholic 28-21. His fourth touchdown of the night came with less than a minute left in the game to secure the win. 
On the season, Boney leads District 11 with 177 carries for 1,446 yards and 22 touchdowns.
